description: ALM files are saved as part of an overall Alpha Five developer library database. They may be reused in other Alpha Five applications. To attach a library to a database, select the "Libraries" tab within the "Database Properties" window.
NOTE: In 2013, Alpha Five became Alpha Anywhere.

common_filenames.description: [Name of your database].alm - When a database is created, the ALM file will be created with the same name as your database.
